description:
A long ship at some 3,000 meters, the Meltlan LST (Landing Ship Tank) is the capital ship carrier vessel for the Meltlandi war machine. The Meltlan LST, like it`s Zentradi counterpart the http://anidb.net/ch48779 [Quiltra-Queleual] Class, is a planetary assault ship that carries troops, vehicles and mecha for planet-side operations.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-lst.htm
name: Meltlan LST
